TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextView extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.PagedControl

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供可程式化控制項，用於在行動網頁上以選擇性標記標籤顯示大量文字。

span.span: Provides a programmable control for displaying larger amounts of text, with optional markup tags on a mobile page.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於在行動裝置的表單中的常值文字，您可以設定的內容從程式碼。Unlike literal text in a mobile form, you can set content of a from code. 不同於行動控制項，您可以包含的值中的標記屬性。Unlike a mobile control, you can include markup within the value of the property. 此外，控制項是小心，不要重新編頁期間插入的項目，例如連結中斷。Also, the control is careful not to break up inserted elements such as links during pagination. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[內表單標記常值文字](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05e061ed-9916-4ece-bfc8-7bf131fe232e)。For more information, see [Literal Text Inside Form Markup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05e061ed-9916-4ece-bfc8-7bf131fe232e). 如果內，將屬性`true`允許傳送到行動裝置上的多個頁面的文字。If the control is within a , set the property to `true` to allow text to flow across multiple pages on mobile devices. 如果控制項不是在，放置名稱控制項放入屬性。If the control is not in a , put the name of the control into the property. 大多數其他的屬性和方法行動控制項是多個開發人員的用途的新裝置配接器來呈現特定裝置上的內容。Most other properties and methods of the mobile control are of more use to developers of new device adapters for rendering the contents on specific devices. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to： 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立數字識別每個句子中的質數和加入到這些句子控制項。The following code example creates numbers and identifies each prime number in a sentence, and adds those sentences to the control. 此範例也會使用自訂分頁提供只有完整的文字頁面一次。The example also uses custom pagination to provide only a page full of text at a time. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileTextViewSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileTextViewSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

span.span: The number of items displayed per page after pagination.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自訂裝置配接器開發人員會使用屬性來呈現內容。The property is used by developers of custom device adapters for rendering the contents. 如果是零，分頁不是受這個屬性。If zero, pagination is not affected by this property. 如果是非零值，會覆寫表單分頁時，每頁顯示的項目。If nonzero, overrides items displayed per page when the form is paginated. 預設值是零。The default value is zero. 支援內部分頁的行動控制項也會提供一項稱為自訂分頁功能。Mobile controls that support internal pagination also provide a feature called custom pagination. 通常，這類控制項要求您為他們提供所有這些文字方塊可以顯示的資料。Normally, such controls require you to provide them all the data that they can display. 開發人員指定的清單中的項目總數屬性。Developers specify the total number of items that are in the list in the property. 屬性會指定多少項目控制項會顯示每個頁面。The property specifies how many items the control displays per page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定每個回傳的項目數。The following code example sets the number of items for each postback. 這個範例是針對較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example for the class overview. [!code-csharp[MobileTextViewSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/cs/Default.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[MobileTextViewSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/vb/Default.aspx#2)]

span.span: Occurs when a control is custom-paginated and needs more data.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項已自訂分頁時，您不明確地將控制項繫結。When control is custom-paginated, you do not explicitly bind the control. 分頁之後，控制項就會引發此事件，表示資料的哪個部分為必要。After pagination, the control raises this event, indicating what part of the data is required. 應用程式可以處理這個事件，並繫結的控制項的所需的資料。The application can handle this event and bind the control with the required data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂的分頁，並呼叫方法來載入指定的每一頁的項目數。The following code example demonstrates how to create custom pagination and call the method to load a specified number of items per page. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileTextViewSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileTextViewSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關標記資訊 (例如\)，支援其屬性，請參閱類別討論。For information about the tags (such as \) that supports in its property, see the class discussion. 屬性可以指定使用`Text`屬性，或為內部文字。The property can be specified by using the `Text` attribute, or as inner text. 如果屬性已指定這兩種方式中，內部文字一定會優先。If the property is specified in both ways, the inner text always takes precedence. 不過，如果以程式設計方式設定屬性，就會自動移除內部文字和新設定的優先順序。However, if the property is programmatically set, the inner text is automatically removed and the new setting takes precedence.
